actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to oppression of minorities in Rumania and requesting the President and appropriate committees of Congress to take this situation into consideration before taking further action on tariff treatment for Rumania.

summary.text: Condemns the oppression of minorities in Rumania by the Country's Communist regime. Directs the President of the United States and the appropriate committees of the Congress to take this situation into consideration before taking further action on most-favored-nation trade status of Rumania.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to oppression of minorities in Rumania and requesting the President and appropriate committees of Congress to take this situation into consideration before taking further action on tariff treatment for Rumania.
